ResearchProjectDef.label: Slug neophyte
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows some basic slug tricks: - Beerawecka recipe at a butcher table - Make silk out of dew at a tailoring bench - Install wooden tail, optical and sensory tentacles

ResearchProjectDef.label: Slug amateur
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks torturing nature recipes at a butcher table: - Egg + dew = more dew - Egg + krap chunk = more chunk - Fertilized egg + krap chunk = ??? You can also throw these eggs for extinguishing or emp effects.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Slug scholar
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Allows to install prosthetics to slugs: - Optical tentacle prosthetic - Sensory tentacle prosthetic - Tail prosthetic
Unlocks their crafting at a smithy or a machining table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Slug expert
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Allows to create an alternative vestigial shell that will unlock an ability when installed.
Allows to install bionics for slugs: - Optical tentacle bionic - Sensory tentacle bionic - Tail bionic
Unlocks their crafting at fabrication bench.
